name: Native's Trick
description:
Natures Trick is a 2D RPG platformer designed and created at the CGX Grad Game Jam 2020. The Team consists of two programmers creating procedurally generated levels, AI integrations, and a dialogue system for quests. The artists created sprites and animations using a 32x32 pixel art style. A member, who is a musician, mixed all the sounds and ambient/soundtrack. The playable character must help other animals earn karma points, depending on how well the player does this will change the ending of the game.

The general consensus was to create a game similar to the indie game "Do it for me". The idea was that players' morals will be challenged based on multiple playthroughs. The game was made in Unity.
